description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任中国人民解放军战略支援部队政治工作部主任、火箭军副政委。中共第二十届中央候补委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army (PLA), he has served as Director of the Political Work Department of the PLA Strategic Support Force and Deputy Political Commissar of the PLA Rocket Force. He is an alternate member of the 20th Central Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省盐城市下辖的县，丁兴农的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Yancheng City, Jiangsu Province, China, and the birthplace of Ding Xingnong.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军衔，对应上将军衔和少将军衔之间。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army, between Lieutenant General and Major General.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会选出的中央委员会。
description.en: The Central Committee elected by the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军四总部之一，负责全军的武器装备工作，2016年军事改革中被撤销。
description.en: One of the former four general departments of the PLA, responsible for the weaponry and equipment of the entire army. It was dissolved in the 2016 military reform.

nodes.id: 总装备部工程设计研究总院

zh-cn: 总装备部工程设计研究总院

description.zh-cn: 原隶属于中国人民解放军总装备部的科研机构。
description.en: A research institution formerly affiliated with the PLA General Armament Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国负责航天测控的部门。
description.en: The Chinese department responsible for aerospace tracking and control.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军衔，对应中将军衔和上校军衔之间。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army, between Major General and Colonel.

nodes.id: 中央军委装备发展部政治工作局

zh-cn: 中央军委装备发展部政治工作局

description.zh-cn: 中央军委装备发展部下属的政治工作部门，其前身为总装备部政治部。
description.en: The political work department of the Equipment Development Department of the Central Military Commission, formerly the Political Department of the General Armament Department.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军网络空间部队

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军网络空间部队

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的独立兵种，由原战略支援部队网络系统部等单位为基础重组。
description.en: An independent branch of the People's Liberation Army, reorganized from units such as the former Network Systems Department of the Strategic Support Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾存在的战略性兵种，于2024年撤销番号。
description.en: A former strategic branch of the People's Liberation Army, whose designation was abolished in 2024.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军火箭军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军种之一，主要负责陆基核力量和常规导弹部队。
description.en: One of the services of the People's Liberation Army, primarily responsible for land-based nuclear forces and conventional missile units.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 丁兴农出生于江苏建湖。
description.en: Ding Xingnong was born in Jianhu, Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 丁兴农是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Ding Xingnong is a member of the Communist Party of China.

position.en: Deputy Director of the Cadre Department of the Political Department

description.zh-cn: 丁兴农曾任总装备部政治部干部部副部长。
description.en: Ding Xingnong served as Deputy Director of the Cadre Department of the Political Department of the General Armament Department.

relationships.target: 总装备部工程设计研究总院

description.zh-cn: 丁兴农曾任总装备部工程设计研究总院政委。
description.en: Ding Xingnong served as Political Commissar of the General Armament Department's Engineering Design and Research Institute.

description.zh-cn: 2008年，丁兴农任中国卫星海上测控部党委书记、政治委员。
description.en: In 2008, Ding Xingnong was appointed Party Secretary and Political Commissar of the China Satellite Maritime Tracking and Control Department.

description.zh-cn: 2010年7月，丁兴农晋升为少将军衔。
description.en: In July 2010, Ding Xingnong was promoted to the rank of Major General.

relationships.target: 中央军委装备发展部政治工作局

description.zh-cn: 2012年3月，丁兴农任总装备部政治部（后为中央军委装备发展部政治工作局）主任。
description.en: In March 2012, Ding Xingnong was appointed Director of the Political Department of the General Armament Department (later the Political Work Bureau of the Equipment Development Department of the Central Military Commission).

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军网络空间部队

position.zh-cn: 战略支援部队网络系统部政治委员
position.en: Political Commissar of the Network Systems Department of the Strategic Support Force

description.zh-cn: 丁兴农曾任战略支援部队网络系统部政治委员，该部后被重组为网络空间部队。
description.en: Ding Xingnong served as the Political Commissar of the Network Systems Department of the Strategic Support Force, which was later reorganized into the Cyberspace Force.

description.zh-cn: 2019年，丁兴农晋升为中将军衔。
description.en: In 2019, Ding Xingnong was promoted to the rank of Lieutenant General.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队

position.en: Director of the Political Work Department

description.zh-cn: 2021年12月，丁兴农任战略支援部队政治工作部主任。
description.en: In December 2021, Ding Xingnong was appointed Director of the Political Work Department of the Strategic Support Force.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军火箭军

description.zh-cn: 2024年4月，丁兴农调任火箭军副政委。
description.en: In April 2024, Ding Xingnong was transferred to the position of Deputy Political Commissar of the Rocket Force.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 丁兴农是中国共产党第二十届中央委员会候补委员。
description.en: Ding Xingnong is an alternate member of the 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.
